org.sd.text
Class DefaultSplitterFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.text.DefaultSplitterFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
SplitterFactory
public class DefaultSplitterFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements SplitterFactory

Default implementation of the SplitterFactory interface to generate DefaultWordGramSplitter instances.

Author:
Spence Koehler

wordAcceptor

Constructor Detail

DefaultSplitterFactory

public DefaultSplitterFactory()
Default constructor.

Sets normalizer to an IndexingNormalizer with a null wordAcceptor.

DefaultSplitterFactory

public DefaultSplitterFactory(java.util.Properties properties)
Properties based constructor.

Properties:

  • normalizer -- (optional, default=IndexingNormalizer) specifies the normalizer to use in a format suitable for ReflectUtil to build.
  • acceptor -- (optional, default=null) specifies the wordAcceptor to use in a format suitable for ReflectUtil to build.

Method Detail

Create a WordGramSplitter instance for WordGrams with the given number of words.

a WordGramSplitter instance for the given number of words.
